pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Use the Value Map</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Your understanding of the Value Map is a powerful tool to remind Dr. Bennett of his practice priorities and to link them to the solution that you can offer. Keep your focus on what you included earlier in the Value Map. Remind Dr. Bennett of Sunnydale Psychiatry’s priorities, and show how the co-pay card may help patients remain on their treatment plans, which will enhance the practice’s ability to address or control side effects and achieve positive patient outcomes.</welcomeText>
